column2: A Khajiiti captain, blown far from his homeland by a massive storm, Tahar embarked on an unprecedented campaign of piracy, pillaging and terror. His legacy of blood and treasure is admired by his fellow Khajiit, but feared by all others.
Increases the chance of looting §YArtifacts§!, after sieging enemy Holdings.
column3: Augmente les chances de piller des §Yartefacts§! après avoir assiégé des propriétés ennemies.
column4: Erhöht die Chance nach Belagerungen feindlicher Besitztümer §YArtefakte§! zu plündern.
column6: Aumenta la posibilidad de robar §Yartefactos§! tras sitiar posesiones enemigas
